name: Suspicious Curl Usage on Windows
description: Detects a suspicious curl process start on Windows and outputs the requested document to a local file
query: ((process.executable:/.*\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR process.pe.product:/[Tt][Hh][Ee]\ [Cc][Uu][Rr][Ll]\ [Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee]/) AND (process.command_line:(/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*%[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]%.*/ OR /.*%[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]%.*/ OR /.*%[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]%.*/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Ee][Ss][Kk][Tt][Oo][Pp]\\.*/) OR process.command_line:(/.*\.[Jj][Pp][Gg]/ OR /.*\.[Jj][Pp][Ee][Gg]/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Nn][Gg]/ OR /.*\.[Gg][Ii][Ff]/ OR /.*\.[Tt][Mm][Pp]/ OR /.*\.[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]/ OR /.*\.[Tt][Xx][Tt]/) OR process.command_line:(/.*\ \-[Oo].*/ OR /.*\-\-[Rr][Ee][Mm][Oo][Tt][Ee]\-[Nn][Aa][Mm][Ee].*/ OR /.*\-\-[Oo][Uu][Tt][Pp][Uu][Tt].*/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\curl.exe OR process.pe.product:The\ curl\ executable) AND (process.command_line:(*\\AppData\\* OR *\\Users\\Public\\* OR *\\Temp\\* OR *%AppData%* OR *%Temp%* OR *%Public%* OR *\\Desktop\\*) OR process.command_line:(*.jpg OR *.jpeg OR *.png OR *.gif OR *.tmp OR *.temp OR *.txt) OR process.command_line:(*\ \-O* OR *\-\-remote\-name* OR *\-\-output*)))`
